reviews.review:
Short and sweet. Great addition to half life. 

There are some technical problems with it - such as autofiring when you load the game after dying. My computer also struggled with this one, while it was able to play half life (not source) with no problems at all.

Worth buying in a sale.

Contrairement aux trois-quarts des gens, je n’ai pas joué à Half-Life à sa sortie en 98. Je l’ai fini pour la première fois la semaine dernière. C’est un jeu qui a très bien vieilli mais je ne pense pas que ça soit le chef d’oeuvre indépassable du FPS (apparemment au contraire des trois quarts des gens qui écrivent les critiques).

J’ai enchaîné avec Blue Shift tout de suite après et je dois dire que j’ai beaucoup aimé, peut-être même plus qu’Half-Life. Le problème d’Half-Life c’est que pour les standards d’aujourd’hui, c’est un jeu long, très long. Bien sûr, les environnements sont variés et les niveaux très inventifs, mais il arrive qu’on s'ennuie.

Blue Shift est une version « light «  d’Half-Life. Il y en a pour environ 4-5h de jeu mais les niveaux s’enchaînent très rapidement sans qu’on ait le temps de s’ennuyer. Les combats sont amusants, les puzzles pas (trop) prise de tête.

Alors bien sûr il y a des gens pour critiquer l’absence de nouvelles armes, l’absence de nouveaux monstres ou bien et je cite « le pack de textures HD qui dénature l’esprit du jeu ». Ces gens là sont des esprits chagrins qui ne le jugent pas comme il devrait être: un jeu fun, pas la suite du messie du FPS.
I knew I shouldn't have went to work today...
Really good game but very short.
Muy buen juego, gráficos fellitos :B pero la buena historia lo compensa :D, pero esta repleto de bugs
Not as good as the previous 2 campaigns. In my opinion. But still good.
Similar to Opposing Force, My only problem is that it's too short. But that's only a minor nitpick. It's pretty damn good, totally worth your time & money.
It's got some some glitches. Get it on sale or in a bundle.  It's more like an extra hour or three of half life one. I do love the attention to detail.

+) Interesting story for those who played Half-Life.
 
 -) Has all the problems that Half-Life has, such as accelerating problem on downhill, hard to get on ladder, terrible mapping for there is no clue.
Awesome to play as Barney
Graphic is annoying. Gameplay horible

8/10 - Short and sweet addition of Half-Life action... with a lot missing

Pros: Same atmosphere and feel as Half-Life

Cons: Half the weapons, some of the puzzles are pretty obscure compared to Half-Life's

So this is interesting, I'd say it's not as good as half-life and half-life: opposing force, but it's still a great game and still worth your money. The gameplay is pretty much identical to opposing force and the original half-life so that's it really, nothing else to say.

"Эй, встретимся потом, я куплю тебе пива!"

Второй аддон для культовой игры 1998 года - Half-Life. Чем же может Синяя Смена удивить игрока?

Во-первых, здесь, к сожалению, мало нового. По сюжету мы наблюдаем происходящее с точки зрения Барни - охранника Черной Мезы. И это, пожалуй, единственное, что отличает аддон от оригинала - в остальном никакого нового контента (в отличие от Opposing Force, где были шикарные экзотические виды оружия) играющий не получит, как бы того ни хотел.

Во-вторых, дополнение воистину очень короткое и занимает примерно часа 3-4 в зависимости от скрупулезности обследования локаций. Плохо это или хорошо? Решать игроку: фанаты вроде меня опечалятся малым раскрытием вселенной, а другие, наверное, останутся довольными.

Подытожив, можно сказать, что Blue Shift является неплохим аддоном, но, в силу однообразности и недостатка новых идей, едва ли он может затмить интереснейшую историю про Адриана Шепарда (имя которого, кстати, возможно является пасхальным яйцом на клавиатуре одного из компьютеров в Portal - ох уж этот Valve).
Buy it.
Good DLC
I like this play through more then the origional, feels more realistic.

Half-Life: Blue Shift это небольшой аддон к Half-Life, который мне очень сильно понравился. Он очень короткий, но не мало  интересный. Я рекомендую эту игру любителям Half-Life. В этом дополнении все вопросы, которые возникли в Half-Life 1 становятся открытыми. Логическая концовка. Ты смотришь на все происходящее друими глазами, глазами Барни Колхуна.

Una expansión decente, mantiene lo que funcionaba del juego original lo suficiente como para ser disfrutable, pero no agrega lo necesario para considerarse innovadora.

Si te gusta Half-Life, no hay por qué no jugarla.

Me gusto bastante esta expansion... estar en los zapatos del guarda de seguridad que aparece al principio de HL. Quien lo iba  a creer XD... Es bastante corto... pero tiene puntos interesantes... como cuando ves a gordon freeman...

Es genial 8/10

Blue shift is a fun little expansion to the Half Life universe, following barney instead of Gordon, but in a simultaneous story.

This is something I love about the half life games: It's not just a massive shoot-em-up. The levels are designed to be puzzling, and this game is no exception. Good variety of puzzles with clever solutions.

I won't say too much about the quality of the graphics and sound, it's an old game after all.

This is a pretty short game, but if you liked the original half-life, then you might as well get this to play. You'll enjoy it.
Ребят игра охеренннннннная покупайте не пожалеете

Two different things in this Expansion pack,
One new NPC model, and new story line.

Dans cette anthology de Half Life, vous incarnerez Barnet Calhoun que l'on rencontrera dans Half Life². Vous viverez son aventure pour sortir de Black Mesa après la catastrophe qui si est produit. Si vous avez aimé l'original, vous aimerez tout autant celui-ci.
calhoun sooooo op 90/10 you need this game

Game has great potential, but has aged very poorly in terms of gameplay mechanics. Combat is clunky, and it is easy to get stuck on "puzzles" due to bad controls. This might have been good back in the day, but not now.
Good expansion to the Half-Life game. I enjoyed the challenging puzzles throughout the chapters and the story from a different perspective. Relatively short but pleasant to play nonetheless

A well produced mini-campaign. About three hours of gameplay. More plot driven than the Opposing force DLC. If you can get it for a price that you think is fair for three hours of content, then do it.
Historia paralela vivida por un guardia de seguridad, mientras transcurre el verdadero Half Life con Gordon Freeman. Si te quedaste con ganas de mas HL, compensa.
Слишком короткая, Но немного помогает узнать сюжет лучше.
篇幅有些短，游戏的连贯性感觉较半条命和针锋相对有所提升，政府部队较多，玩起来很爽！

É bom como o Half-Life original e a expansão Opposing Force, mas é um pouco mais curto e não tem inimigos ou armas novas, também se utilizando da mesma mecânica e gráficos dos demais. Contudo, é uma história diferente, passando-se entre os mesmos acontecimentos, e você visita novos setores da Black Mesa. Aqui você está na pele de Barney Calhoun, um segurança que visa escapar do local após o incidente em Half-Life ter profanado o caos. Apesar de não ter tantos detalhes de enredo quanto os outros dois jogos, vale a pena pra quem os jogou e quer ver os fatos em uma terceira perspectiva.
An excelent DLC for an amazing game.

A rather good expansion to the original half life.

You play as Barney Calhoun, a security guard at the black mesa research facility.

The game starts off  with you making your way to your guard duty just like any other normal day when you encounter a set of devastating events that set forth the half life story.

This game runs parallel to the original half life. A must try for all half life fans.

10/10

Continuando con la saga de half life  sigue blue shift; el guardia de seguridad se las debe de ingeniar para poder ayudar " a los cientificos " lo malo del juego es que no esta disponible en el idioma en  español ( segun sí lo esta pero se mezclan las voces en ingles). pero cuando uno es fan del juego eso queda en segundo plano.

Well this chapter of Half-Life isn't my favourite but still better than Opposing Force. The gameplay is different but more similar to the original game since here you're just a security guard not a super-soldier. The main flaw of this game is it's lenght. I mean, 2 hours, seriously? And I didn't played on the easiest level what's more I got stuck several times, but still.. Very short adventure, at least enjoyable.

никчемный аддон в плане продолжительности и нововведений- единственное, что понравилось, так это High Definition pack. Игра до боли коротка, оружия  меньше того, что было в оригинале. Сама игра 2001 года- спустя три года после выхода оригинала, графика -морально устаревшая даже для того времени. Рекомендую только фанатам Half Life, коим и являюсь я.
Opposing Force намного круче и интереснее
non riesco a giocarlo. lo schermo rimane nero si vede solo il puntatore del mouse.
GG

Das zweite AddOn von Half-Life ist ganz den hilfsbereiten Wachmännern Black Mesas gewidmet. Der Spieler erlebt dabei die Ereignisse des Hauptspiels aus der Perspektive des Sicherheitsangestellten Barney Calhoun. Wie auch in Opposing Force wird dabei ein eigener Handlungsstrang erzählt, der sich jedoch mit der Haupthandlung an mehreren Stellen berührt.

Was das Gameplay an sich angeht, werden im Gegensatz zum ersten AddOn praktisch keine Neuerungen eingeführt. Blue Shift spielt sich also praktisch 1:1 wie Half-Life, ist jedoch im Vergleich zum Hauptspiel markant kürzer. So kommt man auf ungefähr vier Stunden Spielzeit.

Blue Shift ist daher vor allem ein Spiel für Leute, denen Half-Life sehr gefallen hat und weitere Hintergründe zum Black Mesa-Vorfall erfahren möchten.

Edit: Die deutsche Fassung ist leider stark geschnitten.

[h1] Ох, рано встает охрана [/h1]

Half-Life: Blue Shift является еще одним аддоном к HL. 

Здесь мы побываем в шкуре обычного охранника Барни у которого день точно не задался.
То дверь заела, то с лифтом беда, а еще этот каскадный резонанс... Барни оказался не в том месте, не в то время. Чтож, остается только взять себя в руки и пытаться выжить.

В общем и целом, HLBS представляет собой куцый аддон, который легко "пробегается" за 4 часа.

Как говорится: "Вкусновато, но маловато!"

7 пончиков из 10.
Я делаю обзор на эту игру
I always get the weirdest shifts...
не понравилась
If you loved the original half life and wanted more to explore then its worth the pennies.
Barney reyisi oynadığımız bu bölümde Half Life 2 de karşımıza çıkan bazı kişileri asında daha önceden tanımamıza olanak sağlıyor çok uzun bir oyun olmaması keyifli ve sıkıcı olmaması güzel

Considering this was originally going to be an extra feature on the unreleased Dreamcast port, I'll cut it some slack for being short and not adding much.  If you like Half-Life's gameplay style and want to see the story from yet another perspective, I'd definately recommend giving this a look.

The cupcake version of Half-Life.
Play as Barney Calhoun and show United States Marines, Black Ops Ninjas, and inter-dimensional mutants that real badasses wear ties and make $26,000 a year.
this game had less guns than normal half live and its faster to finsh, but its still great

Good addon for the best First Person Shooter ever!

8/10

This puts you in the vest of one of the guards in half-life that you called a "dipshit"

You play as Barney Calhoun.

This adds some insight to the experience of those "dipshits" that you assaulted with a crowbar to get a "badass pistol so I can go pew pew"

Theres alot this adds to a sort of "behind the scenes" to xen AKA the "border world"

This holds a similar aspect like Portal 2 where you plunge into the depths of Aperture in the 80's, because you visit the abandoned Black Mesa labs that is no longer used. ( as far as HECU knows )

The ending to this is suspensful and action packed.

Самая короткая из глав в серии HL, но главное не это а то что она изобильно сдобрена всем тем что позже будет улучшено и доработано в игре Half Life 2: это и тёмные коридоры в жанре хоррора, и физические загадки для продвижения по сюжету, и главное логичная концовка - концовка, после которой начало второй части уже не будет задавать вопросы: Кто такой Барни? Как профессоры сбежали с Блэк Мессы, и вообще некоторые другие вопросы по первой и второй частям отпадут сами собой... (мне лично было интересно откуда берётся тележка которую Гордон заталкивал вначале первой части) - теперь знаю ^^
неплохое дополнение half life в роли барни
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8oTiWJ5vbSA

La ultima expacion para PC de este maravilloso juego en el que veremos a barney un policia, ( no el dinosaurio :V ) de black mesa que trata de escapar despues del accidente de black mesa.
La verdad espere un poco mas de historia , mejores armas o algo nuevo como la primera expancion.
Para los que jugaron las primeras entregas nos sirve para entender pequeños detalles, si vas a jugar half life por primera vez deja este para el final.
8/10.
I like playing through the eyes of Barney. Short and sweet DLC but feels limited compared to its previous DLC

How to make Black Mesa a better workplace : Give the fat policeman his donut or he will shoot you!

Rating:
7.0
good
Great game! Short and to the point, a must have for any Half life fan. If you liked Half life your going to love this.

A small side DLC to half life i believe, follows the events of a security gaurd of black mesa during the resonence cascade. it is very much so in close resemblance to he origional half life game and the art styles can get old after awhile because its practically the same game reskinned to a different character. anyway it was still worth my time and the gordon freemen cameos in the begining and the end made the game awesome. pick this game up if you can because Calhoon the main character in this game is also a main character in the second game.

『Half-Life』のスピンオフ2作目。警備員のバーニィ・カルホーンが主人公。
第一作目とほぼ同時間軸を別のルートで描かれており、ちょっとした
ファンサービス的な要素も楽しめる。

戦闘が激しく、真っ向勝負だと苦戦を強いられるが、回復、弾薬のバランスが良く、
何とか進める難易度。
敵の突然の出現などにビックリさせられることが多かった。
また、終盤の謎解きに一部厳しいものがあった。
日本語化はできず英語のみだが、何となく聞き取れれば問題なく進むことができる。


＜一言攻略メモ＞

クリーチャーより、生身の兵士との戦いがキツイ。
有効な武器を見極めて使う必要あり。
前作がクリアできていれば、それほど苦労せずクリア可能。
top

Another Classic for you to waste your money on. buy it! 

9/10.
Barney OP
oyun güzel
Mall cop simulator.
Short and straight to the point, yet not too short.  Story well done and not too difficult.  (7/10)
Барни: Эй, встретимся потом, я куплю тебе пива"
You get to play as a mute security guard who wrecks havoc upon firearms specialists and aliens from an alternative dimension with a crowbar, and owes a mute theoretical physicist a pint.
Небольшое продолжение Классики...

THe Second official Expansion to Half-Life and in my opinion the better. While it is actually smaller, both in scope and features the scope makes sense. You play as Barney Calhoun, a member of the Blue shift ..i.e the security force of Black mesa. Yup That's you.

The events run parallel to to the story of Half Life and Opposing FOrce though Mr. Calhoun has the distinction of the three which you might already be able to guess at.

The Good:

* Well Done Areas
* Short Play Time
* High CHallenge

YOu'd think SHort Playtime would be a bad thing but honestly it works to the advantage of the game. Much like Portal it's juuus long enough to be fun but not so long that the areas start to drag on or feel padded. The challenge is ramped up due to the simple fact that barney has limited armor... no HEV, PCV charging or energy packs for you... just whatever you can strip off the corpses of your comrades. It adds a layer of tension.

The Bad:

* Fewer Weapons

This is about the only con and it makes sense.Barney is conf9ned to the more mundane weaponry.... but again this feels right.

All in all a great addition that does better than opposing force at expanding. opposing Force while good suffered from trying too hard .. Blue Shift is confident enought in what it offers that it doesn't need to throw much in.
Классное дополнение, яркое интересное. Жаль короткое... Зато у барни концовка предопределена.

Half Life: Blue Shift это достаточно качественный аддон для Half Life! 
Как и в Half-Life: Decay, Half-Life: Opposing Force — Half-Life: Blue Shift изображает события, произошедшие в Half-Life, но c точки зрения охраника "Черной Мезы". Игрок во время игры может увидеть, как пробегает по своим делам доктор Гордон Фримен; посетит уже знакомые места. 
Также разработчики улучшили графическую часть игры.
Но не смотря на все это, Blue Shift очень коротка в прохождении!
Также в отличии от Opposing Force в Blue Shift по сути не добавили ничего нового, как это было с Opposing Force!
Игру можно пройти, но если только все игры из серии Half Life уже были пройдены!
[h1]8/10[/h1]

While i love Half life, i cannot really say this is a good Half life game.  It doesn't add anything new like Opposing force did, and it doesn't add any new enemies like opposing force did.  Instead, it's basically a retread of Half life, just in different spots.  The game is also very short, but there are some memorable moments.  

Just grab this game on a sale.

Personal rating 6/10.

Begin the secend expansion pack for  HλLF-LIFE, Blue shift was release on june the 12 2001 and is  still to this day a good game. I'll would recommend this game so much to the Half Life fans out there that just can't get enough of the series.
A stellar game that touches on the first with grand success in my books. Fast paced game play and alien invasions will keep your toes on edge.
kinda good but REALLY short

This game is fun,but it is no where near as good as Half Life or Opposing Force.The Training Course was not unique and was the same training course as the Half Life's Training Course,with a few changes.The game adds nothing new,all weapons are the same,and there are no enemies either.The game is extremely short giving you an easy 2 or 3 hours.None of the chapters were bad,the ending was a bit dissapointing,but most Half-Life endings aren't that great.The game did have a few clever puzzles in it.But other than that,this game was only a small expansion pack that explains Barney's part of the story.I reccommend Opposing Force much,much more than this game.Opposing force has much more to offer than this.Overral,the game is not bad,just short and could've been longer.8/10
10/10 Would Blue-Shift again.

This game is short and sweet. It retells the early parts of Half-Life's story from a different perspective. This game is more Half-Life with extra story elements; do not expect anything more.

If one plans on playing both expansions, play this one first. Otherwise, one may feel underwhelmed by this game after playing Opposing Force.

I know the Half-Life for many years and was a huge pleasure to be playing anyway. 
Since younger I followed the "gambles" my older sister and always scared me (Children with aliens gives it> <). 
Even though Half-Life: Blue Shift, the gameplay is amazing not limited only in Aliens, action is its focus. 
I loved it, recommend it!
the best blue shift game ever
Half-Life Opposing Force is better.

This is a good little story about a security guard who has to evacuate people from Black Mesa and he does it exactly the same time as Gordan Freeman had his little accident and he tries to escape. Good voice acting still. It's just a good little game.

Рекомендую игру для общего ознакомления с вселенной Half-life. В ней рассказывается судьба охранника Барни Калхуна в исследовательском центре Черная Меза. Опять же, как и в Oposing force мы встретим на своем пути гордона фримена, в начале игры, когда он будет проезжать мимо нас на монорельсовом вагончике, и в конце игры, там Гордона в бессознательном состоянии тащат два охранника, рассуждая о том, каким образом избавиться от него (Гордона). В игре постарались выжать из движка максимум для того времени, как показатель, разные лица у ученых, нестандартные загадки и пути их решения. Даже будет недолгая прогулка по зену, которая безоговорочно доказывает, что зеновский воздух вполне пригоден для дыхания человеком. из минусов могу указать лишь на совсем малую продолжительность, всего 3 часа нужно на прохождение игры более менее опытным игроком, лично я прошел ее за 2:25. однозначно хорошая игра 
9/10

It maybe not as good as the the orignal or OpFor but it's another perspective of the game.
I don't even care that it doesn't introduce new weapons and Sh*t it still gives me the vibes and awesome feelings as the previous games!!!

Segunda expansión para Half Life que apenas añade nada a la historia, sólo un par de detalles.
La mayor pega es su duración (poco más de 2 horas).
Además tiene menos armas y menos enemigos.
De calidad muy inferior a Opposing Force, pero aún así recomendable para los que disfrutaran con los juegos anteriores.
No está en español (a diferencia de la antigua versión en físico), pero se puede buscar un archivo en alguna web y listo.

Half-Life: Blue Shift gives the player a different view in someone else's eyes in the Black Mesa Research Facility incident. It was interesting to see what this character saw what happened during the craziness of the incident. Anywho it was quick, short and sweet but a really cool side-story game! Play this game if you're interested in a Half Life game with a different character view!
While an interesting view on the scenario, it is quite short and not really all that challenging. Suitable if you are just craving "a little bit more..."
Da ba dee.

A competent addition to the Half-Life series which helps shed light on what happened to many of the other characters in the events during the original Half-Life. While it lacks the depth and length of Opposing Force, it takes the tools available to it, and makes a solid game out of it. I'll admit a couple puzzles went a little bit strange with their solutions, but apart from that it's a decent extra for those interested in extending their playtime by another two or three hours while also getting some good storyline.

10/10

It's nice playing as other characters filling some holes in the Half life franchise

Compared to the original game and the first expansion pack : Opposing Force ; Blue Shift doesn't do justice to the Half-Life name in terms of gameplay. As Opposing Force sets the bar high, Blue Shift does little in terms of gameplay and weapons.
The story is good and short, you play as Barney Calhoun (the very same from HL2), who is a Black Mesa security personel and gets caught in the Resonance Cascade.
7/10 'Okay', worth playing for the story and if you're a Half-Life dedicated fan.
Its A good Game,But Valve Please Give Me A Refund.Please.
una expansion de half life que no esta nada mal para passar el rato

Если бы меня спросили, какая самая слабая часть в серии HL, то я бы несомненно бы назвал Blue Shift, потому что непонятно, для чего этот аддон сделан. Сюжетно он не привносит никаких особых изменении, оружие такое же, как и в оригинальной части, враги оттуда же. По сути, эта та же первая часть (игра так же начинается с поездки на монорельсе), только с другим персонажем, локациями и без боссов (даже в конце). Если же вам, как фанату, хочется посмотреть на новые локации и взглянуть на любимую Чёрную Мезу с другого ракурса - то смело включайте, благо игра проходится за 5 часов, но вот после себя никаких ощущений не оставляет.

6 из 10

wikiや攻略サイトを見ない限りまず進めないＭＡＰがありイライラします。
もうちょっと分かりやすいＭＡＰにして欲しかったですね。

Blue shift is, practically, any decrease in wavelength. Oh, wait, it is also the expansion pack (the 2nd one) for the critically acclaimed game Half Life! And this one was also developed by Gearbox. Interestingly, it came more than a year after Opposing Force, the 1st expansion pack, and while that one packed a punch, Blue Shift did not really offer anything new.

So, there is no real new content here: no new weapons, enemies or new music. But! It is Half Life! And also, you control Barney! The security officer who was bashing the door when you were riding the train with Gordon in the base game. 

And this is why I liked in Opposing Force, as well. How the new protagonist's story was connected to that of Gordon. You could see a familiar locale in the distance (when in the helicopter in the beginning) or the aforementioned example of the security guard. 

In any case, while Blue Shift did not really offer anything new (graphics-wise it came with a neat high-res texture pack, though), it offered the same cool atmosphere we loved Half Life for.

Blue Shift is a short but all the more entertaining ride! Highly recommended to all Half Life fans!

If you liked the original Half Life, you will probably like this too. It's essentially the same, aside from showing the origin of Valve (so many valves you need to turn). 

This time the story is told from a guard's POV. Man, if only the other guards were as useful as Calhoun, the first Half Life would have been so much better!  Just like Freeman, Calhoun started his ordinary day at his job, until the incident happened. Being that Calhoun was a guard and experienced shooter, Blue Shift is more believeable than the original Half Life where a scientist becomes Rambo. 

Gameplay and visuals are the same since it's using the same engine. Unlike Half Life, it wasn't too heavy on the platforming, but that's probably because the game is really short. While I wasn't trying to break Half LIfe, I never encountered any problems with enemy AI. In Blue Shift, enemy AI was really terrible at times. At one point where you're locked in a truck with the scientist, they kept throwing grenades at the locked door and killed themselves. Another time I flanked them and they just froze and didn't register me at all after shooting them. Guess it isn't as polished as Half Life.

NPCs are once again a chore. When I was escorting the scientist to the lab, he kept stopping and complaining that he's tired. The first time he did that was back in the truck. He didn't even leave the truck and he complained about beeing exhausted. 

Overall, the game was too short to stand out too much, and most of the gameplay was too similar to Half Life. It was still fun playing it and a nice touch, getting to play as one of the guards. From what I hear, this event gets completely ignored in Half Life 2, but can't complain about that, as nothing much happened story wise in this expansion. 6/10
НОСТАЛЬГИЯ больше нечего сказать!
